In England, in the seven days to 02 November, there were 226,051 new confirmed cases (399.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 October, there were 246,863 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 8% (20,812 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 November is 7,901,039 (13,971.7 cases per 100,000 population).
